title: Wheat Heads for Longest Rally Since April on War, Weather Risks
description: Chicago wheat futures headed for the longest rally since April as Black Sea supply risks and weather uncertainties support prices.
content: Chicago wheat futures headed for the longest rally since April as Black Sea supply risks and weather uncertainties support prices.
